name: Promotion Class: Archdruid
description:
Role: Ranged Damage-Healing

Balanced upon the precipice of Life and Death magic, this master of nature can heal a group or set up devastating explosions with their orbs.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +150
Support Power +75
Final Mitigations +10%

Traits Granted:
Life Tray Unlocked
Mystical Staff Proficiency
Mail Armor Proficiency
Mystical Staff Mastery

Enhancements:
Blight: Now converts Heal Orbs into Exploding Orbs and Orbs deal more damage when they explode.  Can also explode more Orbs at once.
Bark Skin: Now increases Thorns by 200%.
Grasping Roots: Now applies Blackmantle when used.

New Mechanic:
Essence Burn: Life Powers will generate Essence when used. If your Essence fills over 80% you will gain Essence Burn, causing you to take damage each second until you die or reduce your Essence under 80%.
Using powers in the Death Powers Tray will reduce your Essence.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Archdruid promotion class and prevents access to the Stormcaller and Earthkeeper promotion classes.
